scripts.prebuild: mkdirp dist/css dev/css src/_vendor && cp -R node_modules/foundation-sites src/_vendor/foundation-sites && touch dev/css/phila-app.css
scripts.watch: node-sass --include-path node_modules/foundation-sites/scss --output-style expanded --source-map true -w src/sass/phila-app.scss dev/css/phila-app.css
scripts.build: node-sass --include-path node_modules/foundation-sites/scss --output-style expanded --source-map true src/sass/phila-app.scss dev/css/phila-app.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' < dev/css/phila-app.css -o dist/css/phila-app.min.css && node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true dist/css/phila-app.min.css dist/css/phila-app.min.css
